attr_Processing_Method: The method used to process the organic dehydrated onion.
attr_Color: Color of the dehydrated onion powder.
attr_Grade: Quality classification assigned to the dehydrated onion flakes or slices.
attr_Mesh_Size: The mesh size of the organic dehydrated onion, indicating particle size.
attr_Origin_Country: The country where the organic dehydrated onion was originally produced.
attr_Packaging: Type of packaging used for the onion powder.
attr_Onion_Type: Variety or color of onion used in the toasted dehydrated product.
attr_Granule_Size_Mm: Size range of the minced onion granules in millimeters.
attr_Quality_Grade: Grading or quality level assigned to the toasted dehydrated onion product.
attr_Product_Form: The physical shape and size of the dehydrated onion product.
attr_Onion_Variety: The specific type or color of onion used to make the dehydrated product.
attr_Packaging_Type: The type of packaging used for the organic dehydrated onion.
attr_Cut_Size: The size of the cut of the dehydrated onion.
attr_Organic_Certification: Indicates whether the dehydrated onion flakes or slices are certified organic.
